name: A.I. Made this Game in 1 Hour
name_original: A.I. Made this Game in 1 Hour
description:
This game was developed only with AI, from ideas to code and music. And this next description was made also by the AI:

"Welcome to Brick Smasher, the fast-paced and addictive game where you take on the role of a hero on a quest to defeat an evil wizard who has trapped the citizens of the kingdom inside brick and stone blocks. Use your paddle and ball to smash through the blocks and free the citizens, taking on increasingly challenging levels and facing off against tough obstacles and traps along the way. With a fun and funky chiptune soundtrack and retro-style graphics, Brick Smasher is the perfect game for anyone looking for a casual yet challenging gaming experience. Download now and start smashing those bricks!"

Controller:

A / Left Arrow = Go Left

D / Right Arrow = Go Right
